subtitles:
43036 46333 [ Girl ] People once believed
that when someone dies...

46398 50524 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

53888 58942 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

62021 66812 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

118841 123186 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

123260 126392 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

129821 133620 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

135936 139035 Devil's fuckin' Night.
What's the count so far?

140482 143200 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

143267 147938 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

150789 153987 [ Man ] You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

154055 158661 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

158728 160933 - ls this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

161002 163752 - We found her, and you missed it.
- l don't care what her name is.

163819 166308 l didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

166380 169698 l can see why they took away
your gold shield.

169773 172677 Yeah, l wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.

180561 184588 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

184658 186798 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

186868 190644 Look, l will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

203034 206897 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

206971 210104 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
216287 218427 You lied to her about Eric.

220095 223675 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

234661 240153 Now, come on.
Come on. lt's okay.

261697 265561 [ Sarah ] A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

265635 268418 l used to think that was true
about everything...

272774 276550 But now l know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

276615 280806 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

317493 320560 What are you,
like the night watchman?

341022 344253 You know, what this place
needs is a...

346656 350880 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

350945 353815 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
353890 356095 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
356163 359099 Hey, hey, let me do it.

359173 363036 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

363110 365445 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

365511 367367 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.

376779 380457 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

380524 384301 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

386159 389706 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?

389776 392876 - They make you fart big time.
- [ Chuckling ]

398932 401551 [ Man ] You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

401621 404142 from all the crap
floating around in it.

405271 408850 l wish l could have seen that.
[ Whistling ]

508541 512317 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

534343 537606 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car, cop car.

544555 547044 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

554767 557320 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.

557391 560557 - Mickey, call it in for me!
- [ Woman Shouting ]

672092 676501 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely.''
lt's pornography.

686112 689048 - [ Shelly ] No! Eric!
- [ Man ] See ya!

737579 740395 - Hey, that's good.
- [ Man ] That's good.

744110 747559 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

750769 755025 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

758547 760457 You go over there
and talk to your pals--

763573 767120 Are you out of
your motherfuckin' mind, man?

790912 795037 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

795105 798849 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

798915 801883 - Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
801956 804641 Fire it up! Fire it up!

807750 809660 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doin'?

843604 846955 - l love you.
- Say that again.

860154 863221 - [ Sarah ] Wow, you look great.
- [ Shelly ] Ta-da!

869982 872438 - Come here! [ Laughing ]
- No, no, no!
917327 920744 * lt doesn't matter how you hide *
920817 924015 * We find you if we're wanting to *

926291 929970 * So slide back down
and close your eyes *

930037 934065 * Sleep a while
you must be tired *

969092 972955 24k, huh? lt's 18k.
lt's crap. lt's probably fake.
975333 979678 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?

984169 986724 l'll give you 50 bucks.
And l hate charities.

986794 989513 Now, you,
take it or leave it.

997999 1001033 - You cheap ass, chrome dome...
- [ Siren Wailing ]

1004049 1006318 Close the gate
when you go out!

1006386 1008939 Oh, l close this up
for you real good, massa.

1011508 1014804 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1019318 1023597 Lucky l didn't stab
your fat ass.
1043648 1048221 * That point me to another day *

1124350 1127384 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?

1177562 1180116 l ain't murdered nobody, man!
l don't even fucking know you!

1180187 1184117 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- l want you to tell me a story.

1184189 1187451 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1187518 1189975 - You're out of your fucking mind--
- Listen!

1190047 1194718 l'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1194785 1199521 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.

1204964 1210532 Shelly, yeah, yeah. l shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1219401 1224106 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. lt's fun!

1224172 1228614 lt's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1233136 1235592 l'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1270430 1276062 * Sometimes it rains inside my head *

1283650 1287776 - Look at this mess!
What's the world comin' to?
- lt's a mess.
1292774 1294783 * No, they don't have to take you *

1294856 1297507 l got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1297577 1301986 * No, they don't have
to take you away *

1302057 1305255 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1306316 1308171 Give me some of that
over there!

1310317 1313864 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1313934 1318507 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1318575 1322254 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? lt's tragic.

1322321 1326349 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1326419 1330315 - ls the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1371524 1375999 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.

1412243 1418126 * No, they don't have
to take you away **

1424505 1427539 [ Man ] Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!

1445377 1450681 - [ Clearing Throat ]
- l told you to stay out of here.

1450754 1454268 So l guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1454339 1458202 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

1463879 1466749 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1472202 1475749 - ''Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.''
- [ Laughing ]
1490161 1492497 Who the fuck is this now?

1499252 1502931 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1510232 1514325 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1521660 1525852 ''Suddenly l heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1525918 1529695 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door.''

1536546 1540509 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

1542821 1545691 l'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1576145 1581232 l repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1582804 1586122 lt was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1588726 1592241 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

1599323 1602171 That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

1602235 1605171 l think you can rule out
accidental death.

1605245 1607929 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1607997 1611992 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1612063 1616604 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1616673 1618528 l'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1618594 1622207 Word to the wise:
Watch your fuckin' mouth.

1623363 1625666 What the hell
do you call that?

1629253 1632867 l suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1632935 1635587 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1644909 1647430 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1647502 1650286 Okay, the rings!
l'll tell you about the rings!

1650351 1654576 They're in that metal box!
lt's under the shelf there!

1654642 1659946 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1663381 1665870 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1682043 1686103 Oh, it's beautiful.
l don't believe it.

1708998 1711813 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1714920 1717671 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1717737 1720258 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1720330 1722632 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1722699 1727589 T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1734287 1736939 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1737008 1739563 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1741170 1744433 Each one of these is a life...

1753175 1757169 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1765468 1769495 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1771326 1775221 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1775294 1778776 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!

1802249 1805567 lt's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.

1812460 1816740 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1831028 1834805 l am the police and l say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1834870 1839825 And l say l'm dead and l move.

1843128 1847319 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1847386 1850387 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1852188 1855255 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1855325 1859156 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?

1861855 1866265 l want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1866337 1870975 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1871043 1875322 - lt's gettin' too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1875397 1877732 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1877798 1882207 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1882279 1884769 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1884841 1888190 - [ Looter ] Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1888265 1893418 - [ Glass Shattering ]
- He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1893484 1896997 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

1902543 1905806 - [ Woman Laughing ]
- [ Looter ] Leave it, run!

1915188 1917676 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

1917748 1919986 and you lose him
right out in the open.

1920054 1925653 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. l hate that.

1933691 1936791 Just wish l was a little
hungry again, that's all.

1936860 1940920 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, l may get it, l know.

1975658 1979457 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

1979532 1982632 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

1982701 1984392 l didn't have nothing
to do with that.

1987086 1990284 l got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

1990352 1992557 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

1992625 1997002 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

1997075 1999531 Gentlemen, by all means,
l think we ought to have...

1999604 2002671 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2005238 2007694 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2007766 2010451 - Whatever you say, l can do.
- Good.

2013272 2017136 l still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2017210 2021490 ls that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2021563 2023353 Call it my need to know.

2063020 2066185 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

2069903 2074028 He was a buttface.
l could have made it.

2074096 2077031 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2081011 2085551 lt's more like surfing than skating.
l wish the rain would stop, just once.

2086677 2090027 - lt can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2106282 2110692 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2110764 2114921 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

2118350 2122411 ''We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--''

2124529 2127280 Big ''kick me'' sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2127346 2131276 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2131348 2137013 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2137078 2140495 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2140568 2144398 - l know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- l bet he does.

2151132 2154711 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2156894 2161434 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.

2196236 2199783 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

2223639 2226160 - There's a big fuckin' bird over there.
- * No more **

2262917 2267262 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!

2273867 2276770 lt's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2284366 2289004 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2290928 2295665 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2319258 2321878 Stop me if you heard this one.

2329951 2332602 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2336161 2338301 ''Can you put me up for the night?''

2343588 2347997 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?

2350118 2354048 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2377297 2379184 l've got a gun
in my pocket.

2382098 2384718 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2416736 2421047 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2421121 2425694 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2435683 2440289 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2468848 2472362 lf l wanted ice,
l would have asked for ice!
2475666 2478897 Fill it up yourself, macho man.

2493625 2496114 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2496186 2498554 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2498619 2501435 This is a first.
Do l bow or do l curtsy?

2501500 2504184 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.

2512736 2516283 - You stay put right there.
- [ Groaning ]

2557234 2562735 [ Man On Radio ] As you can see, l'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2562803 2565422 - [ Door Squeaking ]
- the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2565492 2568363 lt was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2568438 2571253 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2571319 2573393 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2573465 2575505 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2575577 2580150 ln fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--
2583099 2586450 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

2592479 2596026 l saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2596097 2598269 You still have your hat on.
2613479 2617604 are you some kind of... ghost?

2626828 2631205 l don't know what l am. l need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2633134 2637031 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2637104 2640072 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2640145 2644554 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

2647219 2651411 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2651478 2654545 Her body finally just gave it up.

2654615 2658325 l saw it.
l couldn't do jack for her.

2685090 2687099 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2687170 2692411 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2692485 2697026 l was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2697095 2699911 Give me something
l could work with.

2704585 2706975 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2707051 2710249 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2710316 2713633 would talk after
what happened to you?

2716878 2719432 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.

2725233 2729545 Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2734229 2738060 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2738135 2741485 l used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2753693 2757971 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2762464 2765531 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2769025 2771612 l thought l'd use
your front door.

2774532 2780131 Look, man, l'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2790762 2794146 [ Gideon ] l got stabbed!
l shot the son of a bitch!

2794220 2797221 l watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2797293 2800229 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2800302 2803401 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2803470 2805894 l saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2805969 2810225 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2815187 2817555 - What else did you see?
- So far l haven't heard...

2817621 2820010 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2820085 2825390 What do l get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.

2828184 2833074 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!

2840061 2842396 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2842462 2844372 What're you tellin' me,
this thing is real?

2844446 2847960 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2848031 2851830 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2851906 2855867 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2858564 2863519 Eyes see. lt's one of the most important
things l learned from my sister.

2863590 2866723 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister? [ Laughing ]

2870057 2873124 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

2873193 2875366 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

2875434 2878788 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

2878915 2882232 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

2882308 2885571 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.

2887846 2891460 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

2894569 2899044 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

2899115 2903306 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
2903373 2905959 l ain't makin' all this up.

2906029 2910374 l ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

2918579 2923402 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

2933240 2936111 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

2945052 2947257 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

2949886 2954557 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

2954624 2958400 l'll have the janitor
come on up.
3027163 3029018 * lt can't rain all the time *

3029084 3033427 [ Skipping ]
* Can't rain all the time *

3042145 3044731 [ T-bird ] l don't know how many times l
gotta tell you. We're in this together!
3044801 3047617 One part falls, it all falls!

3047682 3051000 - You know how long it took us
to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

3051076 3053532 That piece of ratshit made Tin Tin
into a fuckin' voodoo doll!

3058632 3062659 Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

3112443 3115860 What the fuck are
you supposed to be, man?

3142983 3146116 - Oh, shit!
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

3156716 3160972 What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? l got it.

3162511 3165294 We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

3165359 3168328 - This is business, right?
- [ Gun Cocks ] Faster.

3175252 3177555 l hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

3179093 3181941 - What in the crap--
- [ Tires Screech, Siren Wails ]

3188088 3190675 When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

3196027 3198898 This is Vehicle 48. We got us
a big, old, red hot rod.

3204670 3207323 You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out.

3226151 3228290 Oh, my God!
Get outta the way!

3238924 3243016 - [ Engine Rattling ]
- Holy shit! Goddamn foreign cars!

3255762 3259309 Oh, l hate this.
This ain't good.

3281500 3284600 But l don't know what--
What? Huh? What?

3284669 3287321 What are you talkin' about?
No, no, no, no, no.

3287390 3290358 You mean that place downtown?
Yeah, l remember her.

3290431 3292504 We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

3292575 3295708 She wasn't going along
with our tenant relocation program.

3295777 3299226 And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear...

3299298 3302595 into a total cluster fuck!
Who gives a shit?

3302660 3305793 lt's ancient history!
Why? What do you want?

3305862 3310565 What is it? What?
Speak to me. Speak!

3321131 3326119 l know you. l know you.
l knew l knew you.

3326189 3330113 l knew l knew you.
But you ain't you.

3330240 3334039 You can't be you. We put you through
the window. There ain't no coming back.

3334115 3337411 This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

3337476 3339746 We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

3344166 3347014 There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!
3356843 3359659 and felt how awful goodness is.''

3426789 3428994 [ Woman ] This is the 7:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

3429062 3431299 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

3431367 3435559 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, ''Devil's Night''...

3435625 3438921 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

3438986 3444138 Last year over 200 blazes were reported,
and 11 people lost their lives.

3444204 3449159 Tonight may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever.

3449230 3452711 The mayor has firefighters
from all surrounding counties--

3452783 3456429 Do you like them up or over?
l can't remember.

3458385 3461004 What are you doing?
l don't even like eggs.

3461074 3465812 - Wait, you loved eggs.
- Yeah, when l was five.

3465877 3469839 So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

3469910 3473107 So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

3473176 3478065 Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

3483739 3488761 You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

3491167 3495291 Oh, forget it. l never was
too good at this mommy shit.

3518952 3521768 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

3521833 3524966 We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

3525035 3529096 - We're gonna have to l.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-bird.

3531085 3532973 Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

3544626 3548010 l got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right...

3551284 3553619 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

3553686 3557430 - You're the detective. You tell me.
- Okay.

3557495 3559535 Gideon's blows all to hell and you're
having a chitchat with some weirdo...

3559608 3562359 who winds up in T-bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

3562425 3565273 Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

3565338 3567194 and you're saying this is
just a fuckin' automobile accident?

3567259 3569463 - Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

3569532 3571474 l didn't want to interrupt you.
lt sounded good.
3571548 3573437 You gotta write that shit down.

3575422 3578358 The captain's got a little
love note waiting for you.

3578431 3582208 - Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
- Suspension?

3585922 3589786 [ Dials Phone ]
Yeah, give me the lab.

3638454 3640943 [ Shelly ] One for sorrow,
two for joy...

3641015 3643732 - Come here.
- ...three for a girl, four for a boy.

3737884 3741497 You said,
